description: Reports when the limit of clients has been exceeded on an interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on interface $v2 exceeded the limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimitExceeded JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimit u 9999

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimit

description: Reports when the number of clients on an interface has fallen
below the limit allowed on that interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on interface $v2 is below the maximum limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimitAbated JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimit u 9999

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerInterfaceLimit

description: Reports when a health event occurs in the V6 Local Server
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerHealth JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerEventSeverity i 0 JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerEventString s EXAMPLE

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6RouterName

description: The text of the event string associated with the health event.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCPV6-MIB::jnxJdhcpv6LocalServerEventString
